alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 18 at 5:24AM CDT until March 18 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Choctaw County in southwestern Alabama... Northwestern Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Wayne County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 523 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles north of Turnerville to Sanford, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waynesboro, Butler, Clara, Lisman, Millry, State Line, Buckatunna, Silas, Pennington, Gilbertown and Toxey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.
